name: Maze Up!
description: Maze Up! is a simple and fun maze/labyrinth puzzle for everyone. In Maze Up! you have to click on tiles to rotate them by 90 degree clockwise to find a way through a labyrinth. The game contains 400 mazes in 8 different sizes from 3*3 to 10*5 and 3 different game modes like: normal mode, timed mode, limited rotation mode.
